Html:
Hi,

I want users to copy-paste images on browser (just like Word).

This control works perfectly on Firefox v5. But, it doesn't allow copy-paste images on IE8.

 

I believe, it's mostly related to IE8. I've already enabled options like 'Allow clipboard access by Script' and added site under Trusted zone but still the issue is coming.

 

Please help on this as it's really critical issue for me.

 

Thank you,
Sagar S.
